let.value: {SELECT J.supplier_id, J.job_id_2, J.job_id_3 FROM ai_scan_jobs J WHERE J.id = stSelectedQAJobId }

{SELECT JR.result, JR.user_name, DNJ.customer_address, DNJ.customer_name, DNJ.delivery_address, DNJ.delivery_recipient_name, DNJ.issue_date, DNJ.order_number, DNJ.supplier_address, DNJ.supplier_name, DNJ.supplier_tax_number, DNJ.supplier_warehouse, DNJ.supplier_id, DNJ.weight_gross, DNJ.fileref_pdf FROM ai_scan_job_result JR LEFT JOIN ai_scan_delivery_note_job DNJ ON DNJ.job_id = JR.job_id WHERE JR.job_id = stSelectedQAJobSupplierANNOTJob1 }

{SELECT DNIJA.row_counter, DNIJA.item_name, DNIJA.manufacturer_item_number, DNIJA.tax_number, DNIJA.amount_number, DNIJA.unit, DNIJA.gross_weight, CASE WHEN DNIJA.item_name = DNIJB.item_name THEN true ELSE false END item_name_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJA.manufacturer_item_number = DNIJB.manufacturer_item_number THEN true ELSE false END manufacturer_item_number_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJA.tax_number = DNIJB.tax_number THEN true ELSE false END tax_number_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJA.amount_number = DNIJB.amount_number THEN true ELSE false END amount_number_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJA.unit = DNIJB.unit THEN true ELSE false END unit_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJA.gross_weight = DNIJB.gross_weight THEN true ELSE false END gross_weight_equals FROM ai_scan_delivery_note_item_job DNIJA LEFT JOIN ai_scan_delivery_note_item_job DNIJB ON DNIJB.delivery_note_id = DNIJA.delivery_note_id AND DNIJB.job_id = stSelectedQAJobSupplierANNOTJob2 AND DNIJB.row_counter = DNIJA.row_counter WHERE DNIJA.job_id = stSelectedQAJobSupplierANNOTJob1 }

{SELECT JR.result, JR.user_name, DNJ.customer_address, DNJ.customer_name, DNJ.delivery_address, DNJ.delivery_recipient_name, DNJ.issue_date, DNJ.order_number, DNJ.supplier_address, DNJ.supplier_name, DNJ.supplier_tax_number, DNJ.supplier_warehouse, DNJ.supplier_id, DNJ.weight_gross, DNJ.fileref_pdf FROM ai_scan_job_result JR LEFT JOIN ai_scan_delivery_note_job DNJ ON DNJ.job_id = JR.job_id WHERE JR.job_id = stSelectedQAJobSupplierANNOTJob2 }

{SELECT DNIJB.row_counter, DNIJB.item_name, DNIJB.manufacturer_item_number, DNIJB.tax_number, DNIJB.amount_number, DNIJB.unit, DNIJB.gross_weight, CASE WHEN DNIJB.item_name = DNIJA.item_name THEN true ELSE false END item_name_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJB.manufacturer_item_number = DNIJA.manufacturer_item_number THEN true ELSE false END manufacturer_item_number_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJB.tax_number = DNIJA.tax_number THEN true ELSE false END tax_number_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJB.amount_number = DNIJA.amount_number THEN true ELSE false END amount_number_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJB.unit = DNIJA.unit THEN true ELSE false END unit_equals, CASE WHEN DNIJB.gross_weight = DNIJA.gross_weight THEN true ELSE false END gross_weight_equals FROM ai_scan_delivery_note_item_job DNIJB LEFT JOIN ai_scan_delivery_note_item_job DNIJA ON DNIJA.delivery_note_id = DNIJB.delivery_note_id AND DNIJA.job_id = stSelectedQAJobSupplierANNOTJob1 AND DNIJA.row_counter = DNIJB.row_counter WHERE DNIJB.job_id = stSelectedQAJobSupplierANNOTJob2 }

{ SUM( iCustomerAddressErrorCount + iCustomerNameErrorCount + iDeliveryAddressErrorCount + iDeliveryRecipientNameErrorCount + iIssueDateErrorCount + iOrderNumberErrorCount + iSupplierAddressErrorCount + iSupplierNameErrorCount + iSupplierTaxNumberErrorCount + iSupplierWarehouseErrorCount + iSupplierIdErrorCount + iWeightGrossErrorCount ) }

{CASE WHEN bSignForEditAgentACustomerAddress = true OR bSignForEditAgentBCustomerAddress = true THEN 2 WHEN bSignForAcceptAgentACustomerAddress = true OR bSignForAcceptAgentBCustomerAddress = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END}

{CASE WHEN bSignForEditAgentACustomerName = true OR bSignForEditAgentBCustomerName = true THEN 2 WHEN bSignForAcceptAgentACustomerName = true OR bSignForAcceptAgentBCustomerName = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END}

{CASE WHEN bSignForEditAgentADeliveryAddress = true OR bSignForEditAgentBDeliveryAddress = true THEN 2 WHEN bSignForAcceptAgentADeliveryAddress = true OR bSignForAcceptAgentBDeliveryAddress = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END}

{CASE WHEN bSignForEditAgentASupplierWarehouse = true OR bSignForEditAgentBSupplierWarehouse = true THEN 2 WHEN bSignForAcceptAgentASupplierWarehouse = true OR bSignForAcceptAgentBSupplierWarehouse = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END}
{CASE WHEN bSignForEditAgentASupplierId = true OR bSignForEditAgentBSupplierId = true THEN 2 WHEN bSignForAcceptAgentASupplierId = true OR bSignForAcceptAgentBSupplierId = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END}
{CASE WHEN bSignForEditAgentAWeightGross = true OR bSignForEditAgentBWeightGross = true THEN 2 WHEN bSignForAcceptAgentAWeightGross = true OR bSignForAcceptAgentBWeightGross = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END}

textview.text: {CASE WHEN stSelectedQAJobSupplierId = "" OR stSelectedQAJobSupplierId = null THEN "Delivery note number not available" ELSE stSelectedQAJobSupplierId END }
{CASE WHEN stSelectedQAJobAnotJobsAgentAResultStatus = "REJECTED" THEN "Rejected by " || stSelectedQAJobAnotJobsAgentAUserName ELSE stSelectedQAJobAnotJobsAgentAUserName END}
{CASE WHEN stSelectedQAJobAnotJobsAgentBResultStatus = "REJECTED" THEN "Rejected by " || stSelectedQAJobAnotJobsAgentBUserName ELSE stSelectedQAJobAnotJobsAgentBUserName END}

if.cond: {bSignForEditAgentBCustomerAddress != true AND bSignForAcceptAgentBCustomerAddress != true AND bSignForAcceptAgentACustomerAddress = false}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBManufacturerItemNumber = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_accept_x ELSE icons.qa_accept END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBManufacturerItemNumber = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

textview.style: {CASE WHEN rB.manufacturer_item_number_equals = true THEN styles.sylTvItemTableNormal ELSE styles.sylTvItemTableDifferent END}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForEditAgentBTaxNumber = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_edit_x ELSE icons.qa_edit END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForEditAgentBTaxNumber = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBTaxNumber = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_accept_x ELSE icons.qa_accept END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBTaxNumber = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

textview.style: {CASE WHEN rB.tax_number_equals = true THEN styles.sylTvItemTableNormal ELSE styles.sylTvItemTableDifferent END}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForEditAgentBAmountNumber = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_edit_x ELSE icons.qa_edit END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForEditAgentBAmountNumber = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBAmountNumber = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_accept_x ELSE icons.qa_accept END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBAmountNumber = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

textview.style: {CASE WHEN rB.amount_number_equals = true THEN styles.sylTvItemTableNormal ELSE styles.sylTvItemTableDifferent END}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForEditAgentBUnit = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_edit_x ELSE icons.qa_edit END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForEditAgentBUnit = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBUnit = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_accept_x ELSE icons.qa_accept END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBUnit = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

textview.style: {CASE WHEN rB.unit_equals = true THEN styles.sylTvItemTableNormal ELSE styles.sylTvItemTableDifferent END}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForEditAgentBGrossWeight = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_edit_x ELSE icons.qa_edit END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForEditAgentBGrossWeight = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

actionbutton.linkIcon: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBGrossWeight = TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) THEN icons.qa_accept_x ELSE icons.qa_accept END}

set.value: {CASE WHEN stSignForAcceptAgentBGrossWeight = "" THEN TOSTRING(rB.row_counter) ELSE "" END}

textview.style: {CASE WHEN rB.gross_weight_equals = true THEN styles.sylTvItemTableNormal ELSE styles.sylTvItemTableDifferent END}

repeater.recordset: {SELECT "" item_name, "" manufacturer_item_number, "" tax_number, "" amount_number, "" unit, "" gross_weight WHERE false }

addbutton.records: {SELECT "" item_name, "" manufacturer_item_number, "" tax_number, "" amount_number, "" unit, "" gross_weight}
